# Data Reshaping, Joining, and Iteration

## Learning Objectives

By the end of this chapter, you will be able to:

1. Apply tidy data principles
2. Reshape data with `pivot_longer()` and `pivot_wider()`
3. Join multiple datasets using various join types
4. Use functional programming with `purrr`
5. Work with nested data structures
